query:
SELECT 
  ja.id,
  ja.jobId,
  ja.contractorId,
  c.name as contractorName,
  c.telegramChatId,
  ja.notificationSent,
  ja.notificationSentAt,
  ja.acknowledgedAt,
  ja.createdAt,
  j.clientName,
  j.address
FROM jobAssignments ja
JOIN contractors c ON ja.contractorId = c.id
JOIN jobs j ON ja.jobId = j.id
WHERE c.name IN ('Mohamed Guizeni', 'Dalwayne Diedericks')
ORDER BY ja.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10
